title: Knights
description: The knights of the F.A.P.D. catching criminals and delivering justice. It’s time to teach these madcap mammals their “devil may mare” attitudes just won’t fly.
quote: We got a white bronco heading east into the forest. Requesting backup.
altHero: Shrek in human form peering out of a cell, a knight grinding pepper into his eyes
alt1: an aerial shot of a man fleeing on a horse
alt2: two hot air balloons in the sky labeled F.A.P.D.
alt3: more knights hold down Shrek, still in human form, as another knight threatens him with a large pepper grinder
alt4: Puss in Boots held up against a wall while a knight shows the camera a small bag of drugs
